question: Which city plays host to ‘GulFood 2020’, the world's largest annual food and beverage trade exhibition?
explanation:
‘GulFood 2020’, the world\'s largest annual food and beverage trade exhibition is being held in the Dubai World Trade Centre city of Dubai, United Arab Emirates (UAE), form February 16 to 20.
In the 25th edition of the exhibition, more than 5000 exhibitors are to participate. The Indian pavilion at the exhibition was recently inaugurated by the Union Minister for Food Processing Industries-Harsimrat Kaur Badal.
